title: 3 and Out - Mahomes Injury Panic; Ramsey Trade Breakdown; Harbaugh Needs Penn State W; Week 7  Preview; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Mahomes Injury Panic; Ramsey Trade Breakdown; Harbaugh Needs Penn State W; Week 7  Preview; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff looks at the potential impact of Patrick Mahomes going down in the Chiefs Thursday Night football win over the Broncos, gives his reaction to the Rams trading for star corner Jalen Ramsey from L.A. and Jacksonville's perspective, why Jim Harbaugh needs to beat Penn State to change his momentum at Michigan, previews the full slate of Week 7 games, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
